name: iMac 24" Realistic Mockup
description:
This is a realistic mockup for the 24" iMac's for spring in all colors currently available.


All current colors available:

  • Orange
  • Purple
  • Pink
  • Blue
  • Silver
  • Green
  • Yellow


Update Apr 29, 2021

  • Added mathematically accurate side profile for all colors.
  • Modified thumbnail to be closer to Apple branding and include side profile.
  • Modified layer order for clarity.


If you'd like to see an angle or accessory added, tweet me @devinsfountain or leave a comment.
